work.title: Google Bans Government Adverts 10 Days Before UK Election
work.story: Eight advertisements posted by the government have been removed from Google's ad network due to a breach of the search giant's policies, a move concurrent with Facebook removing similar adverts from the government for violating the IP rights of the BBC.
